channel.title: Need help, can only log in once per server restart :S
channel.description: so on my server everyone can log into and play 24/7 on my vps... but... only if they dont log out. after youve logged in once you can not get back on it give error connecting or try a different world. I have to restart the server for accounts to be able to log back in.

item.title: Need help, can only log in once per server restart :S
item.dc:creator: @rlmross rlmross
item.description:
@rlmross wrote:

so on my server everyone can log into and play 24/7 on my vps… but… only if they dont log out. after youve logged in once you can not get back on it give error connecting or try a different world. I have to restart the server for accounts to be able to log back in.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, can only log in once per server restart :S
